load_data¶

quality_assessment.helper.load_data(from_path: str, convert_to_meters: Optional[bool] = False) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Loads csv-data from TapeStar Ic-exports.

Parameters

  • from_path (str) – Path of csv-file to be loaded

  • convert_to_meters (bool, optional) – Convert postions from mm to meters. If None, guess whether it’s necessary to convert. Defaults to False.

Returns

Ic-data from TapeStar csv-file

Return type

DataFrame
